page.title: 01Where is Seaton Delaval?
page.content: {Seaton Delaval}is situated approximately 10 miles NE of Newcastle-upon Tyne and 3 miles from the East coast of Northumberland. The{population}in 1981 was 7 243. The{ {centre}of the town is known locally as the Avenue Head (see page 2). The{ {facilities}in the centre are as follows:-a community centre,a library, a variety of shops, a church, a park and the Astley High School. Seaton Delaval is a{friendly}place to live and our school, {Seaton Delaval {First School,}is a friendly, happy school too. {Holywell}is a small village 2 miles S of Seaton Delaval, and its great claim to fame is its impressive record in the{Britain in Bloom}competition.
